data.reviews:
â€œWarface is a military shooter built on a bedrock of satisfying gunplay, slick movement, and sharp visuals.â€
ğŸ•¹ï¸PCGamesN

â€œWarface is a gritty looking first person shooter that focuses primarily on online multiplayer. It doesnâ€™t feature abilities like wall running, jetpacks, or special attacks, but that doesnâ€™t hurt the game. It takes on the more realistic, boots on the ground type of gameplay.â€
ğŸ•¹ï¸Gaming Trend

â€œWarface equally focuses on a handful of PvP game modes, as well as cooperative game modes, such as special operations that will require deliberate planning and teamwork if you want to succeed.â€
ğŸ•¹ï¸SelectButton
